title: Finished 10 games, no ranked solo placement occured
body:
I finished my ranked solo queue placement games, but now there's a blank spot on my profile where my division should be. Any clues to how and when I'll get my placement? Thanks!

**edited to add ranked solo queue*

replies.body:
Hello Dash,

I looked into it and it seems that you've only completed 9 ranked games for your placement matches. You should be placed after playing one more match. Please let me know if you have any questions.

I'm having the same problem yet it won't show how many I've played and I almost guarantee I've played ten. Also the game disconnected at the victory screen as it does sometimes so I had to re-login. Could that be what caused it?
confirmed. played another game and was placed gold. thanks for the help
